choose.when: select hh.rank rank, hh.hashtag hashtag, hh.cnt cnt from(select rownum rank, h.hashtag hashtag, h.cnt cnt from (select hashtag, count(*) cnt from hashtag where logTime > sysdate - 7 group by hashtag order by count(*) desc) h) hh where hh.rank < 11

select hh.rank rank, hh.hashtag hashtag, hh.cnt cnt from(select rownum rank, h.hashtag hashtag, h.cnt cnt from (select hashtag, count(*) cnt from hashtag where logTime > sysdate - 30 group by hashtag order by count(*) desc) h) hh where hh.rank < 11
choose.otherwise: select hh.rank rank, hh.hashtag hashtag, hh.cnt cnt from(select rownum rank, h.hashtag hashtag, h.cnt cnt from (select hashtag, count(*) cnt from hashtag where logTime > sysdate - (select case when (mod(to_number((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy'))), 4) = 0 and mod(to_number((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy'))), 100) <> 0) then 366 else 365 end from dual) group by hashtag order by count(*) desc) h) hh where hh.rank < 11

mapper.select: select to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy.mm.dd') today, to_char((sysdate-7), 'yyyy.mm.dd') weekDate, to_char((sysdate-30), 'yyyy.mm.dd') monthDate, to_char((sysdate-(select case when (mod(to_number((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy'))), 4) = 0 and mod(to_number((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy'))), 100) <> 0) then 366 else 365 end from dual) ), 'yyyy.mm.dd') yearDate from dual

select r.catid catid, round(RATIO_TO_REPORT(r.rcnt)OVER(PARTITION BY r.allcnt)*100) per from (select c.catid catid, count(r.subject) rcnt, (select count(*) from review) allcnt from review r, contents c where r.contentsid = c.contentsid group by c.catid) r order by r.catid

select p.catid catid, round(RATIO_TO_REPORT(p.pcnt)OVER(PARTITION BY p.allcnt)*100) per from (select c.catid, count(p.contentsid) pcnt, (select count(*) from picklist) allcnt from picklist p, contents c where p.contentsid = c.contentsid group by c.catid) p order by p.catid
